Factsheet

James Filomar

TBA

Regular Price:
TBA

Description

Engage your mind with Consonance, a puzzle game featuring procedurally-generated, animated, minimalist scenes. Rearrange the pieces to reveal each unique scene, and challenge yourself with puzzles containing up to 100 pieces.

History

From the developer:

In 2021, I fell in love with creative coding and generative art. This passion led me to explore shader programming. As I learned, I was inspired to create a game that would use my new skills.

That's how I came up with Consonance. It's a puzzle game that puts a new twist on the classic jigsaw puzzle. Instead of matching shapes of the pieces, players match the animation on the pieces, forming a bigger, coherent, animated scene.

Consonance is scheduled for release in late 2025. It's my personal journey to combine art, code, and puzzle-solving into a unique game experience.

Features

  • A gallery of 37 levels: Choose from a collection of 37 animated, minimalist scenes. With procedural generation, levels will be different on every replay.
  • Tailor the challenge: Adjust the difficulty by choosing the number of pieces, from an easy 4-piece to a demanding 100-piece puzzle.
  • Casual Mode: A special mode where puzzle animations are slowed down for a more relaxed experience.
  • Soothing soundscapes: Set the mood with a selection of 10 background tracks produced by Ovani Sound.
